api::item.item.name: 150mm Wheat Zip Sided Boot
api::item.item.longDescription: The Oliver AT45 work boots give you superior protection and, thanks to Olivers built in SOFTstride® comfort system, the ultimate in work boot comfort. Features include - Water resistant leather Full lining infused with eco-friendly Odorban® Control Technology to absorb odour for optimum freshness and hygiene COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Oliver Comfort Footbed enhances natural air flow; infused with Odorban® Control Technology Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole NATUREform® composite toe cap Latex toe cap liner for added comfort Long wearing TPU outsole designed to self-clean rocks and debris from tread. Excellent abrasion resistance

api::item.item.name: 150mm Black Zip Sided Boot
api::item.item.longDescription: Our new work boot may be lightweight, but it packs a punch with heavyweight protection. In fact, its our lightest ever at 55 series work boot and its loaded with the latest technology and innovation. Features include lightweight sole with self-cleaning tread profile, Oliver COOLstep® plush satin feel lining and built in SOFTstride® comfort system. Features include - Water resistant leather Oliver COOLstep® lining to absorb moisture and odour for optimum freshness and hygiene Lace locking fixture Kevlar® thread on critical wear seams for maximum abrasion and chemical resistance COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Oliver SOFTstride® open cell low density urethane foam for comfort and contour Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole support NATUREform® Type 1 Toe Cap. Wider profile for greater comfort Latex toe cap liner for added comfort TECtuff® toe guard Long wearing All Terrain rubber outsole designed for superior grip and durability. Anti-Static Deep tread profile with self-cleaning design

api::item.item.name: 240mm Brown Pull On Riggers Boot - 100% Waterproof
api::item.item.shortDescription: 240mm Brown Pull On Riggers Boot Waterproof
api::item.item.longDescription:
100% waterproof, heavy duty, full grain leather make them ideal for the mining and oil and gas industries.

New features and engineering advancements include 100% waterproof technology and Q-Flex® non-metallic penetration protection insole. The new and improved SAFETYcell®, which comprises of toe bumper, coated leather shell and heel guard, provides the user with all round foot protection from impact and abrasion. 

Innovative moisture wicking NANOlite® foot bed draws moisture from the feet keeping them dry and comfortable for all day wear. All this, while reducing the overall weight of the boots. 

Oliver’s continuous innovation and unique product features makes Oliver Footwear renowned for comfort, durability and performance in the market today.

api::item.item.name: 350mm Black Laced In Zip Mining Boot - 100% Waterproof
api::item.item.shortDescription: 350mm Black Laced In Zip Mining Boot - Waterproof
api::item.item.longDescription: 100% waterproof premium full grain leather; Q-Flex® non-metallic penetration protection insole; new and improved SAFETYcell® integrated TPU heel and toe and coated leather shell for enhanced abrasion and cut resistance; flush, integrated zip contours to the boot, providing full flexibility and support and allows a custom fit to your leg shape; new Y-Guard TPU ankle protector on both sides of the boot provides impact resistance to the ankle and lower leg, and superior torsional support; S3 rating for waterproof and penetration resistance; reflective panel above the heel provides additional safety for increased visibility in low lighting situations; heavy duty Kevlar® stitching across all critical wear seams; increased padding through tongue and leg for increased support and stability; and internal PORON® XRD metatarsal guard.

api::item.item.name: 150mm Brown Lace Up Boot - Waterproof & Caustic Resistant
api::item.item.shortDescription: 150mm Brown Lace Up Boot Waterproof and Caustic Resistant
api::item.item.longDescription:
The 100% waterproof and new CORDURA® vamp make these boots ideal for the construction, agriculture, chemical, oil and gas, mining, and quarrying industries.

The All Terrain 65-490 boots incorporate new features and engineering advancements such as 100% waterproof technology, full CORDURA vamp for abrasion and caustic resistance, and Q-Flex® non-metallic penetration protection insole. Innovative COOLstep® moisture wicking lining and new NANOlite® foot beds draw moisture from the feet keeping them dry and comfortable for all day wear. All this, while reducing the overall weight of the boots. 

The all new AT65-490 boots are the first in the Oliver Footwear range to incorporate the new and improved SAFETYcell®, which comprises of toe bumper, CORDURA vamp and heel guard, providing the user with all round foot protection from impact and abrasion. 

Oliver’s continuous innovation and unique product features makes Oliver Footwear renowned for comfort, durability and performance in the market today. Oliver backs itself with a 30-day Comfort Guarantee allowing customers who have been fitted in-store the option to return or exchange the AT 65 490 boots, should they not be satisfied.

api::item.item.name: Black Lace Up Derby Shoe
api::item.item.longDescription: The WB34 series update has raised the bar in durable, lightweight work boot design. Our new hiker style, zip side ankle boot is made from water resistant leather and features the latest in technology and innovation. With the addition of the premium TECtuff® toe bumper, protection and value have never looked so good. So, you might be working hard, but youll feel like youre walking on air. Features include - Water resistant leather Full lining infused with eco-friendly Odorban® Control Technology to absorb odour for optimum freshness and hygiene COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole support NATUREform® Type 1 Toe Cap. Wider profile for greater comfort GRIPthane® tread pattern for greater traction and heat resistant to 130°C

api::item.item.name: 140mm Black Zip Sided Boot
api::item.item.longDescription: The Oliver WB26 series of non-safety work boots incorporates all our knowledge from 126 years of manufacturing Australias top quality, tough workboots, and presents them in a new state of the art, comfortable and stylish package. Using all the durability, performance and comfort features of the leading Oliver safety range. Features include - Water resistant leather COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole support GRIPthane® tread pattern for greater traction and heat resistant to 130°C

api::item.item.name: Black Elastic Sided Boot

api::item.item.name: Grey Safety Gumboot
api::item.item.longDescription: The Oliver WB22-205 Gumboot is the new standard in comfort, safety and value. Unlike other brands you dont have to pay extra for safety features, such as built in METprotect® for added metatarsal protection. Our boots have it all for one low price, no catches. Oliver Gumboots feature softer, more flexible PVC that provides superior comfort and movement. Plus thanks to our unique optimized fit, with plush NANOlite® footbed, youll have more room to flex, especially when kneeling. Features include - Waterproof PVC STEELflex® steel midsole penetration protection METprotect® Metatarsal protection Kick off spur Two trim heights Hard wearing heavy duty PVC / Nitrile sole that offers extra deep tread for greater stability and grip on uneven and loose surfaces

api::item.item.name: Womens Wheat Zip Sided Boot
api::item.item.longDescription: Slip into a pair of Olivers PB 49 series workboots and youll feel the difference a designer shoe makes. Engineered specifically to suit the unique shape of a womans foot. Features include lightweight sole with stabilising HEELguard, COOLstep® premium lining and Olivers built in SOFTstride® comfort system all designed with you in mind. Features include - Water resistant leather Oliver COOLstep® lining to absorb moisture and odour for optimum freshness and hygiene Oliver SOFTstride® open cell low density urethane foam for comfort and contour support COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole NATUREform® Steel Toe Cap Latex toe cap liner for added comfort Long wearing rubber outsole designed for superior grip and durability Tread pattern designed for excellent slip resistance Specifically designed last to support the unique shape of a female foot

api::item.item.name: Black Lace Up Executive Shoe
api::item.item.longDescription: Olivers new PB 38 executive series workboots take you from the worksite to the boardroom in comfort and style. Features include; premium soft touch leather with lightweight sole and steel toe protection, COMFORTcushion® footbed, plus Olivers built in SOFTstride® comfort system. Executive style never felt so good. api::item.item.name: 180mm Wildland Firefighters Boot
api::item.item.longDescription: Oliver Footwears firefighting and emergency services boots are designed to be the safety footwear choice of the relevant agencies and their frontline personnel. Features include - Water resistant and flame retardant leather TECtuff® toe bumper protection, Heavy duty red Nomex® stitching and flame proof laces. The HS66 Series features a Heavy Duty Nitrile Rubber Soling System, with an integrated comfort layer of urethane cushioning. The hard-wearing nitrile rubber outsole, provides a level of comfort and flexibility, unique to Oliver boots.

api::item.item.name: Kings Black Safety Gumboot
api::item.item.longDescription:
Made from heavy duty PVC with a PVC/Nitrile sole, this Kings safety gumboot is ideal for the agriculture, building & construction, manufacturing and food processing industries. A Type 1 Toe Cap offers a wide profile shape to suit your foot and allows greater comfort with no contact to the toe cap. The sole is resistant to solvents, mild acids, alkalis, some chemicals, oils and fats. Wide grip tread for optimum dirt release and traction. Removable footbed for added comfort. Three trim heights. Reinforced ankle, heel and instep for optimum support. Kick off spur on heel for easy removal. Nylon lined for easier cleaning. Anti-static. Meet AS/NZS 2210.3 Standard. 
View Brochure
